meanings.definition: The organic matrix of bone, consisting of collagen and other proteins.
meanings.sent1: The osseins provide structure and strength to bones.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study osseins to understand bone composition better.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous skeleton hid the osseins to play a prank on the scientist.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as osseins, unyielding to any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The artist sculpted the statue with osseins, creating a lifelike appearance.

meanings.definition: A protein found in bone tissue.
meanings.sent1: The body needs osseins to maintain healthy bones.
meanings.sent2: Athletes consume foods rich in osseins to support bone health.
meanings.sent3: The chef added extra osseins to the soup for a boost of flavor.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty to the team was as strong as the bond between osseins in bones.
meanings.sent5: The researcher discovered a new type of osseins in the fossilized bone sample.
